content:
Diagnosis:
Clear cell renal cell carcinoma, right kidney
T2N0M0, Grade 2
Diagnosed March 2024

Imaging:
CT 15 March 2024 - 7.2cm mass arising from upper pole of right kidney, no evidence of local invasion or metastatic disease
MRI 20 March 2024 - confirms T2 disease confined to kidney, no vascular invasion

Histology:
Ultrasound-guided biopsy 22 March 2024 - Clear cell renal cell carcinoma, WHO/ISUP Grade 2
CAIX expression low on immunohistochemistry

Current situation:
Fit for surgery
ECOG Performance Status 0

Social background:
Lives with spouse
Works as accountant
No smoking history

Current symptoms:
Incidental finding on routine ultrasound
No haematuria or flank pain
Weight stable

Examination findings:
No palpable abdominal mass
No lymphadenopathy
Chest clear

Plan:
Referral completed for right radical nephrectomy
Discussed at Urology MDT 25 March 2024 - confirmed surgical candidate
Follow-up arranged in surgical clinic in 1 week
Post-operative oncology review to be arranged following surgery

primary_cancer.histopathology_status: Clear cell renal cell carcinoma, WHO/ISUP Grade 2

cancer_timeline.value: CT shows 7.2cm mass arising from upper pole of right kidney, no evidence of local invasion or metastatic disease
MRI confirms T2 disease confined to kidney, no vascular invasion
Ultrasound-guided biopsy confirms Clear cell renal cell carcinoma, WHO/ISUP Grade 2, CAIX expression low
Discussed at Urology MDT - confirmed surgical candidate

patient_facts.value: Asymptomatic, incidental finding on routine ultrasound
No palpable abdominal mass, no lymphadenopathy, chest clear

status_updates.value: Newly diagnosed localized right renal cell carcinoma suitable for surgical management. Asymptomatic incidental finding with no evidence of metastatic disease.
Referral completed for right radical nephrectomy
Follow-up arranged in surgical clinic in 1 week
Post-operative oncology review to be arranged following surgery
